title: Holiday Stories #8
description:
Joel Kim Booster, Joe Mulligan, Monte Lamonte and Susan Kent share Christmas memories in our 2015 Holidays special.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Lou Monte, Susan Kent, Death Cab for Cutie, Tom Waits, Joel Kim Booster, Joe Mulligan, Monte Lamonte, Wynton Marsalis)
